title.part1: World's Community token created to help

header.text: World's Community token created to help animals. World's Community token created to help animals. We're proud to be the first crypto currency creators to think outside the box in creating a unique token with unconventional goals. SafePets token was created with one purpose which is to help endangered animals and to make shelters for forgotten pets around the World. Our goal is to be the first accepted crypto currency in shelters and between organizations in the fight to help endangered animals worldwide. SafePets token provides static reflection that rewards holders, which means more tokens being automatically added to your wallet for each transaction made, even if it’s not yours. Guaranteed amazing 0.5% from every transaction is automatically added to SafePets charity wallet which is separated and donated to different shelters and world organizations in the fight for Animal health and Safety. Can’t beat investing and helping change the world at the same time!

countdown.title: When will Safepets Token Launch?
countdown.text: *Time is only approximate and subject to change if necessary

tokenomics.title: Tokenomics
tokenomics.marketingText: 3.5% of every transaction is allocated to Marketing. This allows us to fuel our most ambitious projects in service of further rewarding our community.
tokenomics.rewardsText: 2% of each transaction is redistributed to token investors. That means you can earn more SafePets tokens by just holding them in your wallet.
tokenomics.charityText: We have a designated charity wallet that allocates 0.5% of each transaction made and is donated to support our charity partners.The transfer address in BNB is the following: 0x16Fb5D7e4e68D788De1A16C5172AB1577d934915
tokenomics.liquidityText: 4% of each transaction made is locked away in Pancakeswap’s liquidity pool.

charity.title: Charity
charity.donationDescribtion: Donating to shelters and animal health organizations worldwide.
charity.donationText: SafePets serves to help shelters with providing protection for animals, caring for animals in need and building a state-of-the-art animal adoption center. Animal shelters and rescues are amazing and need our support since they usually have limited resources, very little publicity and or funding. They help an untold number of animals which are just looking for a happy life. This is your chance to give back! Just be a part of our journey and find your way to our road map where you can learn how you can be a part of something world changing.

roadmap.title: Roadmap
roadmap.text: This is our detailed roadmap which outline’s the 9 phases that will lead SafePets to success. Join the journey!

phases.phase: Launch of marketing campaign on social media networks
New Partnerships with international organizations e.g., WWF, IUCN, UNEP

questions.question: What is SafePets Token?
questions.answer: SafePets token is a decentralized cryptocurrency based on the idea of saving pets and other species from extinction one transaction at a time. 2% of each transaction is donated to organizations in the fight to save endangered animals.

questions.question: What do you mean by "decentralized"?
questions.answer: SafePets is designed so that no one, not the creator or other individuals, groups, or governments, can influence, counterfeit, or seize the cryptocurrency account. There is no central point. Technically speaking, it operates according to rules agreed by consensus, rather than decided upon by some foundation or entity.

questions.question: Does SafePets token have a future?
questions.answer: We have a team of professionals that are the best at what they do in the industry. With each passing day the endangerment of animals worsens, so we will be the sun to their moon, and we think everyone will want to be a part of that. Our future looks very BRIGHT!

questions.question: What do you mean by "cryptocurrency"?
questions.answer: Cryptocurrency is a digital currency that is secured by cryptography, in contrast to conventional (fiat) currencies where they are secured by a government or governments. It's money for the people, and the more people own and use it, the more useful and valuable it becomes.

questions.question: Okay, but what does that mean?
questions.answer: Think supply and demand. Only so much supply no matter the demand, the more demand the more valuable it is. Which means you don't have to trust any central organization or person like you would a bank. You are the bank, you’re in control.

questions.question: Who run’s SafePets token?
questions.answer: No-one, or everyone does equally, depending how you look at it. The developers can release new software, but at the end of the day the community must choose to use that software. Remember the community includes not only the end-users, but miners, exchanges, payment processors, etc. We’re all in it for the same reason’s and if every ones in it to win it then it’s a recipe for success.

questions.question: Where can I buy SafePets token?
questions.answer: The first exchange that you will be able to purchase and use the token on will be on pancakeswap.finance.

questions.question: Is my investment in SafePets safe?
questions.answer: Absolutely. All our teams follow strict KYC policies. We will also be doing audits to make sure that nothing slips through the cracks, which can be found in our road map, phases 1 and 7.

persons.title: Michal
persons.text: Uses high quality business strategies and plans and ensuring their alignment and organization of short-term and long-term objectives. Highly experienced in Auditing, Analysis & Forecasts. Michal took part in the European voluntary organization, Future Generation Europe. He’s managed important partnerships and founded the SafePets team. He is currently working as an analyst in the economic law department of one of the largest IT companies in the world.

persons.title: Daniel
persons.text: As a graduate of the banking institute of Prague, he finished the program of Law administration in the business sphere. Daniel manages our campaigns, partnerships & law matters that arise. 15 years of experience in the business making him a key member for networking. He's favorite quote is: Sky is the limit!

persons.title: Martin
persons.text: The head of computer science and full-stack development. Has a wealth of experienced in Blockchain, Trading and Technical analysis. Is an up-and-coming developer in the industry and is a breath of fresh air to work with, bringing new ideas to the table. Martin works as a programmer for a company that develops electric chargers for electric cars.

persons.title: Tomas
persons.text: Our marketing specialist experienced in Trading, Marketing and Finance. Tomas is currently working as Sales Manager for an IT company, where he focuses on marketing and brand building. He implements all experiences and knowledge that he has gained throughout his career into effective marketing and promotion strategies on social networks and online markets.

persons.title: Stefan
persons.text: Stefan is a full stack developer currently working for a digital health company in Bratislava. He specializes in JavaScript, front, and back-end APP development for android, IOS and windows. Specializes in creating content using drones to give the experience of a lifetime. Plays an important part in the development of anything that goes live for SafePets.

persons.title: Alex
persons.text: Alexandra is an extraordinarily talented freelance graphic designer since 2015. Alexandra specialties are All aspects of graphic design, brand identity and has a very strong understanding of advertising design. She has done all the Graphic design and editing of all our web variants. She also plays an integral role in our phenomenal NFT gallery aspect of SafePets.

persons.title: Peter
persons.text: Peter is a self-made business executive, with a broad portfolio of investment companies which invest in forex, shares, ETFS and other assets like cryptocurrencies. At a young age Peter managed to develop his own trading system which provides FX signals so successful today. Key in managing our marketing campaigns, builds important partnerships, and engages with our community and partners. His large rolodex of clients is an essential aspect of the future success of SafePets.

persons.title: Jozef
persons.text: Jozef brings nearly a decade of experience, with an excellent understanding of client/customer relationship, and how to effectively communicate with Native and non-Native English-speaking stakeholders in the online community. He currently works for a tech company as a Deputy VIP Manager based in Prague and have offices worldwide. Which is why he is just the person to be representing SafePets.

antiWhaleShield.title: Anti-Whale Shield
antiWhaleShield.text: SafePets is one of few cryptocurrencies which uses the Anti-Whale Mechanism. This system was designed to save holders from whales trying to manipulate the price in their favor or from dumping the token.

trustwallet.step1Text: Create a Trust Wallet, wallet using either a desktop computer or an iOS/Android mobile device. That will allow you to buy, sell, send, and receive the SafePets token.
trustwallet.step2Text: The fastest way to buy BNB is directly from Binance and send it to your trust wallet. You can buy BNB directly on MetaMask or transfer it to your MetaMask Wallet from exchanges like Coinbase, Binance, etc.
trustwallet.step3Title: Connect your Trust wallet to Pancakeswap
trustwallet.step3Text: Access your wallet to PancakeSwap by clicking ‘Connect to a wallet’ and selecting MetaMask.
trustwallet.step4Title: Swap BNB for your SafePets token
trustwallet.step4Text: You can start swapping as soon as you have BNB available! Press ‘Select a token’ and enter the token address or search for it on the tokens list.

metamask.step1Text: Create a MetaMask Wallet using either a desktop computer or an iOS/Android mobile device. That will allow you to buy, sell, send, and receive SafePets token.
metamask.step2Text1: The next step is to add the Binance smart chain to your wallet. By default, Metamask wallets link to the Ethereum Mainnet. Navigate to the top of your wallet where your thumbnail is located to find the settings button. Click “networks” and “add network”. Next, you’ll need to input the correct values for the Binance Smart Chain, seen below:
metamask.step2Text2:
Network name: Binance Smart Chain
New RPC URL: https://bsc-dataseed.binance.org
Chain ID: 56
Symbol: BNB
Blockexplorer: https://bscscan.com
metamask.step2Text3: You can buy BNB directly on MetaMask or transfer it to your MetaMask Wallet from exchanges like Coinbase, Binance, etc.
metamask.step3Title: Connect your Metamask wallet to Pancakeswap
metamask.step3Text: Access your wallet to PancakeSwap by clicking ‘Connect to a wallet’ and selecting MetaMask.
metamask.step4Text: You can start swapping as soon as you have BNB available! Press ‘Select a token’ and enter the token address or search for it on the tokens list.
